data.eml:eml: Description of Diploplastron dehorityi sp. nov. (Entodiniomorphida, Ophryoscolecidae), a new rumen ciliate from Brazilian sheep (Ovis aries)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cedrola, Franciane, Dias, Roberto Júnio Pedroso, Martinele, Isabel, D’Agosto, Marta (2017): Description of Diploplastron dehorityi sp. nov. (Entodiniomorphida, Ophryoscolecidae), a new rumen ciliate from Brazilian sheep (Ovis aries). Zootaxa 4258 (6): 581-585, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4258.6.8
